title: Himi 574
lyrics:
7.7.7.7. loua
(Fakaha 7:9-17)
1.
Ko e hā nai ‘a e kakai
Kofu hinehina na
He ‘alofi ‘o e langi
Ofi he ‘afio’anga?
Si’i tākanga ‘ena ia,
Mateaki ‘o e ‘Eiki,
Hono kaungāmamahia
He fekuki mo e fili.
2.
Si’i kakai naʻe ‘efihia,
Fou he hala faingata’a,
‘Enau fu’u femili na
Mo e ngaahi tau fita’a;
Matatolu ‘enau tuʻu
Heli, kita, mo māmani;
Lahi fau ‘a honau ngū,
‘Ikai ava ‘enau fai.
3.
Naʻa nau tau ‘a e tau lelei,
Hanganaki muimui
Ofi honau kapiteni;
Ko e vaivai pē kae tuli.
Hono ō pe ‘enau a’u
He taloni ‘o e Lami;
Kau pē ‘ene ngaahi tau,
Kau ‘i hono lāngilangi.
4.
Ko e kau ikuna ē,
‘Osi honau fatongia,
Tā ‘a e fili fua pē,
Lava ‘enau ngaahi hia.
Na’a nau fō pe honau kofu
‘I he toto ‘o e Lami,
Ma’a ange he sinou,
Taau mo e nofo langi.
5.
‘Oi ‘enau monū’ia!
Ko e kovi kuo hili.
Toe pē ‘a e fiefia
He fe’ao mo e ‘Eiki.
Fai ‘e la honau fafanga,
Tufa ‘enau fu’u koloa,
Holo honau lo’imata,
Fakainu ki Vaiola. *
